    <h1>Charlie Newmann is a wonderfull guy, he is my father, my <br> brother, and my father.he has been my father since i was born and it<br>was the in the world The Hog Rider is a fast ground troop<br> with medium hit points, low damage, and the ability to jump over enemy<br> Walls. He is unlocked at level 2 Dark Barracks. The Hog Rider (person)<br> is a bare-chested dark-skinned man holding a hammer. He has a <br> Mohawk, wears a brown leather loincloth, a red belt, and a pair of leather <br> sandals, as well as two large golden wristbands and a gold earring.</h1>

<h1>Charlie Newmann <br> 2005-2037</h1>

    Then the Royales begun to invade their land... many retreated off into other lands joining numerous villages while others stayed to fight, one PEKKA named Cupcakes decided that the normal PEKKA’s were too slow and not agile enough to take on the Royales huge adversary of troops and invented a new version of the PEKKA... the Mini PEKKA, more agile for combat and able to fit in more smaller areas, it helped... but was not enough, the land was taken by the Royales and the Mini PEKKAs were sent with plans to the Goblin lands were Goblins were forced to keep inventing them for battle in the arena’s, meanwhile the PEKKA’s were forced to take part in the Arenas from their lands.</h1>
